actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act and title XVI of such act, to provide for the disregarding of all income and resources deriving from reserved Indian lands in determining eligibility for or the amount of the aid or benefits payable to Indian people thereunder.

summary.text: Provides for the disregarding of all income and resources deriving from reserved Indian lands in determining eligibility for or the amount of the aid or benefits payable to Indian people under the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act and title XVI of such act, to provide for the disregarding of all income and resources deriving from reserved Indian lands in determining eligibility for or the amount of the aid or benefits payable to Indian people thereunder.
